sentences.en: a programme which is, at the very least, excellent PR for the hospital.
sentences.cn: 一个从最坏方面讲也是对医院公共关系绝妙的项目。

sentences.en: At least four high-flying warplanes had to take evasive action.
sentences.cn: 至少有4架高空飞行战斗机不得不采取避让行动。

sentences.en: At least he didn’t lie to me.
sentences.cn: 至少他没跟我撒谎。

sentences.en: At least one estimate puts the total tab at $7 million.
sentences.cn: 至少有一个估价把总数定在了700万美元。

sentences.en: At least they have a real chance to find work.
sentences.cn: 至少他们的确有找到工作的机会。

sentences.en: At least two people died of exposure in Chicago overnight.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上，芝加哥至少有两人冻死。

sentences.en: For low-paid workers, the marginal tax rate is at least 75%.
sentences.cn: 对于低收入的工人来说，边际税率至少为75%。

sentences.en: he was not in the least taken aback.
sentences.cn: 他一点也不惊讶。

sentences.en: He was stunned to discover cost overruns of at least $1 billion.
sentences.cn: 他震惊地发现花费至少超了10亿美元。

sentences.en: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.cn: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

sentences.en: He's the best teacher, even though he has the least experience.
sentences.cn: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.en: his performance was disappointing to say the least.
sentences.cn: 至少可以说她的表演很令人失望。

sentences.en: I don’t expect you to pay me, but you could at least cover my expenses.
sentences.cn: 我不指望你给我报酬，但你至少也得支付我的开销呀。

sentences.en: I don't have the least idea of what you're talking about.
sentences.cn: 我一点儿都不知道你在说什么。

sentences.en: I don't mind in the least.
sentences.cn: 我根本就不在意

sentences.en: I had other matters to occupy me, during the day at least.
sentences.cn: 至少白天我还有别的事情要做。

sentences.en: I try to offend the least amount of people possible.
sentences.cn: 我尽量少得罪人。

sentences.en: It is quite amazing what turns up when you are least expecting it.
sentences.cn: 真的很奇妙，你根本想不到会有什么出现。

sentences.en: Nobody cared, least of all the manager.
sentences.cn: 没人在意，尤其是经理

sentences.en: stay ten days at the least.
sentences.cn: 至少住10天。

sentences.en: That meant that he, notionally at least, outranked them all.
sentences.cn: 那意味着至少理论上他比他们级别高。

sentences.en: The house still needed a lot of work, but at least the kitchen was finished.
sentences.cn: 这房子还有不少活要干，但至少厨房已经完工了。

sentences.en: The human population swelled, at least temporarily, as migrants moved south.
sentences.cn: 随着移居者南移，人口出现膨胀，至少是暂时性膨胀。

sentences.en: The journey would impose extra expense on those least able to afford it.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行会给那些最负担不起的人增加额外的开支。

sentences.en: The least his hotel could do is provide a little privacy.
sentences.cn: 他的酒店至少应该提供一点隐私保护。

sentences.en: The police say his death was an accident, officially at least.
sentences.cn: 警方说他的死是个意外，起码官方消息如此。

sentences.en: The young people are the most eager to learn and the least conservative in their thinking.
sentences.cn: 青年人最肯学习，最少保守思想。

sentences.en: there is a great deal at stake, not least in relation to the environment.
sentences.cn: 涉及许多问题，特别是环境方面。

sentences.en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
sentences.cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

sentences.en: waited at least an hour.
sentences.cn: 至少等了一小时

sentences.en: We traversed the face of the cliff with the least effort.
sentences.cn: 我们花最小的力气以

sentences.en: Whatever its obscurities, the poem was clear on at least one count.
sentences.cn: 这首诗再怎么晦涩，至少有一点是清楚的。

sentences.en: Who knows most says least.
sentences.cn: 懂得最多的人， 说得最少。

sentences.en: You might at least answer.
sentences.cn: 你不管怎样该给个答复

phrases.tran_cn: 无论如何（等于at the very least）
最小二乘法；最小平方法
最小二乘法，最小二乗法
最小二乘法；最小平方法
［一种以退为进的表达，暗示情况更严重］至少可以说

trans.tran_cn: 最小的；最少的（little的最高级）
trans.tran_en: You use the least to mean a smaller amount than anyone or anything else, or the smallest amount possible
less than anything or anyone else
smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
even if something better is not true or is not done
